entry.title: WIND WARNING , Canmore
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 02:25 AM MST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.2°C

Observed at: Banff 02:00 AM MST Monday 13 February 2023

Humidity: 64 %

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: A few showers. Low zero.
entry.summary: Showers except a few flurries near the British Columbia border. Snow level 2100 metres lowering to 1800 metres before morning. Snowfall amount 2 cm near the British Columbia border. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Low zero. Forecast issued 02:16 AM MST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. A few flurries near the British Columbia border in the morning. Amount 2 cm near the British Columbia border. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 02:16 AM MST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight with 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early in the evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 02:16 AM MST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 60%
